description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5v80e","text":"Isolated astrocyte cell culture preparation. Dissociation, preparation and plating of mice cortex neurons and glia cells on MEA. Isolatioin process of the culture from neurons, to obtain an isolated astrocyte culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_affiliation: School of Physics and Astronomy, Tel-Aviv University, Tel-Aviv, Israel

collections.protocol_name: Protocols for activity changes in Neuron-Astrocyte Networks in Culture Under the Effect of Norepinephrine
collections.protocol_name_html: Protocols for activity changes in Neuron-Astrocyte Networks in Culture Under the Effect of Norepinephrine

authors_list.name: Yasmin Bar El
authors_list.affiliation: School of Physics and Astronomy, Tel-Aviv University, Tel-Aviv, Israel

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"99i3q","text":"Dissect and place on ice cortices from pups (post natal day 0 or 1 mice).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"251D64E0BB1911E8BB2549F8A196F74F","id":665168,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Sample collection"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"euvce","text":"1. Chop with scissors in a papain-based dissociation buffer (2.5 mM CaCl2, 0.83 mM EDTA, 137 U papain (Sigma-Aldrich)), 100 \u03bcl DNAse (Sigma-Aldrich), 3\u20135 crystals of L-Cysteine (Sigma-Aldrich), HBSS with 20 mM HEPES (pH 7.4);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"anl0u","text":"2. Place on a rotating shaker for 15 min  at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":40,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"acoat","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"66FAF000BB1C11E8A236B9A4F726216A","duration":900,"label":"","step_guid":"3465BF60BB1911E8BB2549F8A196F74F"}}],"guid":"3465BF60BB1911E8BB2549F8A196F74F","id":665169,"previous_id":665168,"previous_guid":"251D64E0BB1911E8BB2549F8A196F74F","section":"Cell lysis"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cd2rh","text":"1. After centrifuging, discard the supernatant ,  resuspend the pellet in modified essential medium (MEM) without L-glutamine with essential amino acids (Beit Haemek, 06-1025-01-1A), 5% heat-inactivated\u00a0fetal calf serum (Biological Industries), heat-inactivated\u00a0 5%\u00a0horse serum (Beith Haemek, 04-004-1), 2 mM glutamine (Beit Haemek, 03-020-1c), 3 mg\/ml glucose, 2%\u00a0B-27 (Gibco, 17504-044), 0.5%\u00a0Pen\/Strep (100 U\/ml penicillin, 100  \u03bcg\/ml streptomycin; Beit Haemek, 03-031-1B);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4j6bs","text":"2. Triturate seven times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"4E568670BB1911E8BB2549F8A196F74F","id":665170,"previous_id":665169,"previous_guid":"3465BF60BB1911E8BB2549F8A196F74F","section":"Cell preparation"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47ov2","text":"1. Plate the cells on poly-D-lysine (PDL, Sigma-Aldrich, P7405-5MG) coated micro-electrode arrays (MEAs; 200\/30iR-Ti-gr and 500\/30iR-Ti-pr; Multichannel Systems) with a cell density of 2000-2500 cells\/mm2 (~106 cells per dish);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d13sg","text":"2. Maintain cultures at 37 \u00b0C with 5% CO2. Replace growth medium every 3-4 days to astrocyte enriched growth medium: MEM-EAGLE (without L-glutamine, with essential amino acids) (Beit Haemek), 3 mg\/ml glucose, 10% heat-inactivated fetal calf serum (Biological Industries), 0.8% GlutaMAX (100X; Gibco), 0.5%\u00a0Pen\/Strep, 2 mM glutamine (Beit Haemek).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"67572120BB1911E8BB2549F8A196F74F","id":665171,"previous_id":665170,"previous_guid":"4E568670BB1911E8BB2549F8A196F74F","section":"Cell culture"}
